original_title: Three-wheeler driver shot dead in Ahungalle
original_body_lines: Galle, March 1 (Daily Mirror) - A three-wheeler driver was killed in a shooting incident near a hotel in Ahungalla town, police said.
They said a 45-year-old has died in the shooting carried out by an unknown gunman on a motorcycle.
Police suspect that that the shooting was a result of a dispute between two underworld gangs.
